entry.title: @VIBConferences: #Cancer #immunotherapy has become a crucial pillar of anticancer therapy. 19 leading researchers at #ImmunoOnco22 will give new insights into the immune response to tumors and tackle unresolved questions.⏰Registration Deadline: Thursday 2 June. Read more

entry.title: @NatureRevCancer: Our June issue, out NOW! With articles on #therapyresistance, #senescence & targeting CDK4 & CDK6 in #cancer! Plus, a Comment on cancer mRNA vaccines as well as the launch of our new Tools of the Trade articles #NRCToT. So much content 👇🏻💌

entry.title: Nonsense-mediated RNA decay: an emerging modulator of malignancy

entry.title: @cic_film: #ColoniesInConflict - First film in India about Apis dorsata a honeybee species we see around our neighbourhood but know so little about. In the film we tried to follow the trajectory of the Rockbees and witness a possible decline in their population.
entry.summary: #ColoniesInConflict - First film in India about Apis dorsata a honeybee species we see around our neighbourhood but know so little about.
